comment: Dr. Ryan takes an interest in the topics her students study and gives amazing feedback throughout the semester. She will work with you if/when needed and makes such a daunting course a breeze by breaking up the final project into portions due over the semester. She helped me create a paper I was very proud of and was incredibly kind in each step!

I had Dr. Ryan for the capstone course after the previous professor had to drop the course. She was amazing and transitioned us well. She gives you an option and great feedback on your final project. You have the choice of a paper, film, or even a podcast. The deadlines are manageable and made the final semester a breeze

Dr. Ryan is an amazing teacher for your capstone class and will give you great feedback. She really helped me with all my questions regarding the final project, is very respectful, and understanding. I would definitely recommend taking her for your capstone class!

I've actually had Dr. Ryan for MENT 3100 as well as COM4480 and I've enjoyed having her for both classes. So much that I'm taking her again for my media capstone because I know she'll be nothing but helpful. COM 4480 is a lot of work, but she does a good job of making it easier to understand.

Took Dr. Ryan for Media Studies capstone, and she was amazing. I was worried about capstone, but she makes it super clear. She's very flexible on what she allows for people's projects. This class only meets in person about half the time, as she's guiding you on your project. Her feedback is great and she genuinely cares about student projects.

Dr. Ryan is one of the most amazing professors I have taken. I was super stressed going into the Capstone project and she made it fun, and made it fun to do. She was always available for feedback or advice and her upbeat attitude and extensive knowledge really made this a great experience! She will work with you to make sure you do great. TAKE HER!

I absolutely loved Dr. Ryan's class! She's really passionate about teaching and wants you to do well. Instead of tests, you have 4 "Opportunities" which are basically like projects for the chapter (they're not difficult). A lot of assignments are assigned in class & aren't in the syllabus, so go to class. There are a few group assignments!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: Eight Week Course: Amazing online lectures. Quirky sense of humor, which helped while listening to her lectures. Prepare to read your textbooks. Exams are not very difficult. You are guaranteed to make A's or B's if you read the chapters.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Amazing lectures

comment: Took her Com Theory in a 4-week hybrid summer session- not as bad as I thought! Dr. Ryan makes the material easy to understand, but this class requires a lot of outside work, like textbook readings and online assignments. We had tests at the end of each week, but they were fair. Her in-class assignments were creative and fun. Definitely recommend!
Excellent professor! Challenging course but manageable. Take her over other professors.

Prof. Ryan is awesome and made my Capstone actually enjoyable. I totally expected this to be my hardest college course, but she broke a 30 page paper into manageable pieces throughout the whole semester. She tries her hardest to work with groups to make sure they are on the right track all semester. Put in the work and you'll do well.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: Does not answer emails. It made trying to go above and beyond to do well in the course nearly impossible.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: Going in, I expected my capstone class to be the hardest course I've taken. Dr. Ryan made it super easy. She is not a tough grader and gives good feedback. She was quick to respond to any questions that I had.

Despite having a doctorate in communication, she does NOT communicate. I don't mind working for a good grade but the lack of respect or intelligence is unfathomable. She is the kind of professor that makes students stop going just to avoid her. Oh and she doesn't read the papers, she thinks that is the job of turnitin website

Took Dr. Ryan for my Capstone in Fall 2015 and she's fabulous. Yes, it is a difficult class and yes, there is a ton of work, but she has very clear expectations and does whatever she can to help. She did an excellent job breaking up the semester long project into manageable timeframes. There is no textbook for this class. Definitely take her!

Dr. Ryan is AMAZING. She is so helpful. Gives lots of positive and constructive feedback. Upbeat energy, yet very down-to-earth. So intelligent always tries to steer you in the right direction without holding your hand. She wants you to be prepared for the real world.

She is all about helping you and making sure you understand and can relate to the material. Honestly, didn't use the book that much, only for my section in the project. She is really sweet and cool! Totally recommend her.

Hands down my FAVORITE professor at KSU. Dr. Ryan is one of those professors who takes a personal interest in her student's success. I've taken 2 of her classes and learned so much in both. She technically isn't my adviser but offered to help me the way an adviser would. If there was an award for most kickass professor, I'd give it to her. Amazing.

Dr. Ryan is by far the greatest professor I had at KSU. She has an obvious passion for what she teaches and you can tell she actually wants her students to learn. I recommend her to everyone I can. She's wonderful!
Very friendly, very helpful, very smart! Pay attention in class and do the assignments like she shows you and you'll be golden.

Very energetic, very kind, very intelligent. She knows what she teaches and she enjoys teaching. I specifically chose her class for my last semester before graduation because I wanted to end with a pleasant memory of KSU.

Dr. Ryan is an awesome professor! i have taken 3 classes with her and always check to see id i can't take her for something else. She works with her students, answers questions, helps when needed, doesn't expect too much but requires you to learn. You actually pay attention and retain information from her classes. i would recommend her to everyone.

shes pretty straight forward, you need to take every note she says because she pulls from everything she says in class lecture even if its not in the notes. Overall i would recommend her, very helpful, and not dull and boring like many other professors
Dr. Ryan is great. Tests are difficult, but if you attend class and take notes on her lectures, you'll do fine. She is super nice & very clear about what she wants out of her students. Take her!

Dr. Ryan is awesome! She gives a lot of information that is not in the book, so it's a good idea to go to class. Tests are online. We had in-class exercises and small projects for hands-on learning instead of writing some boring paper. Take her for any class you can.
